word embeddings.from sentence: The word embeddings for all of the models are initialized with the 100d GloVe vectors ( 840B token version , ) and fine - tuned during training to improve the performance .

other parameters.from sentence: The other parameters are initialized by randomly sampling from uniform distribution in [ ? 0.1 , 0.1 ] .

hyperparameters.from sentence: For each task , we take the hyperparameters which achieve the best performance on the development set via an small grid search over combinations of the initial learning rate [ 0.05 , 0.0005 , 0.0001 ] , l 2 regularization [ 0.0 , 5 E? 5 , 1E? 5 , 1E? 6 ] and the threshold value
